title: Have hackers been able to intercept VOIP calls? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, VOIP calls can be compromised. This article dates back to 2017: VoIP Hacks Are On The Rise: How To Protect Your Network | GetVoIP And linked within this, from 2016: Hello, You've Been Compromised: Upward Attack Trend Targeting VoIP Protocol SIP Are you wondering about any particular vector of attack, or any particular type of business? Say, like a school (we had some pranksters target some local schools this way two years back for instance), or a hospital? Perhaps a particular hospital in New York? Yes, that’s possible.
